body_html: Case 1. is important because we depend on this fact to implement e.g. THTensor_(sum) efficiently. It's also a breaking change for users, although accumulation into zero-stride tensors has always been playing with fire.

body: Case 1. is important because we depend on this fact to implement e.g. `THTensor_(sum)` efficiently. It's also a breaking change for users, although accumulation into zero-stride tensors has always been playing with fire.
